template.name: @ConfigEntityType
template.value: @ConfigEntityType( * id = "$id$", * label = @Translation("$idHuman$"), * handlers = { * "form" = { * "add" = "Drupal\$module$\ConfigEntity\$idClass$AddForm", * "edit" = "Drupal\$module$\ConfigEntity\$idClass$EditForm", * "disable" = "Drupal\$module$\ConfigEntity\$idClass$DisableForm", * "enable" = "Drupal\$module$\ConfigEntity\$idClass$EnableForm", * "delete" = "Drupal\$module$\ConfigEntity\$idClass$DeleteForm" * }, * "list_builder" = "Drupal\$module$\$idClass$ListBuilder", * "access" = "Drupal\$module$\$idClass$AccessControlHandler", * }, * config_prefix = "$type$", * admin_permission = "administer $module$ $type$", * entity_keys = { * "id" = "id", * "label" = "name", * "weight" = "weight", * "status" = "status" * }, * links = { * "add-form" = "entity.$id$.add_form", * "edit-form" = "entity.$id$.edit_form", * "disable" = "entity.$id$.disable", * "enable" = "entity.$id$.enable", * "delete-form" = "entity.$id$.delete" * } * )

template.name: @ContentEntityType
template.value: @ContentEntityType( * id = "$id$", * label = @Translation("$label$"), * bundle_entity_type = "$id$_$bundle$", * bundle_label = @Translation("$label$ type"), * controllers = { * "storage" = "Drupal\$module$\ContentEntity\$idCamel$Storage", * "access" = "Drupal\$module$\ContentEntity\$idCamel$AccessController", * "translation" = "Drupal\$module$\ContentEntity\$idCamel$TranslationHandler", * "view_builder" = "Drupal\$module$\ContentEntity\$idCamel$ViewBuilder", * "list_builder" = "Drupal\$module$\ContentEntity\$idCamel$ListBuilder", * "form" = { * "default" = "Drupal\$module$\$idCamel$Form", * "edit" = "Drupal\$module$\$idCamel$Form", * "delete" = "Drupal\$module$\Form\$idCamel$DeleteConfirm" * } * }, * base_table = "$id$_b_base", * data_table = "$id$_b_data", * revision_table = "$id$_r_base", * revision_data_table = "$id$_r_data", * fieldable = TRUE, * translatable = TRUE, * entity_keys = { * "id" = "id", * "revision" = "revision", * "bundle" = "bundle", * "label" = "label", * "uuid" = "uuid" * }, * bundle_entity_type = "$id$_bundle", * links = { * "canonical" = "entity.$id$.view", * "admin-form" = "entity.$id$.edit", * "edit-form" = "entity.$id$.edit", * "delete-form" = "entity.$id$.delete_confirm", * "version-history" = "entity.$id$.revision_overview" * } * )
